AirBase.title: You don't have to spend a lot of money to enjoy music!

AboutUs.paragraph1: Ashyo is a household electronics and appliance store chain offering affordable prices. In just 2 months, it has offered customers a wide product range, warranty, and support services.
AboutUs.paragraph2: Ashyo was established in Tashkent in 2022. Today, the company operates 26 stores in the capital and regions.
AboutUs.paragraph3: You can purchase products easily either in-store or online. Installment plans are available with just a passport for registration.
AboutUs.paragraph4: Legal entities can make purchases via bank transfer without any extra charges.
